citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:45 a.m.-11:15
a.m. on 17-AUG-2022.
The inspector arrived at the facility and called licensee. Licensee stated they were not on property and would not be
available for the next 3 to 4 hours. The inspector then left the premises.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:45 a.m.-11:15 
a.m. on 17-AUG-2022. 
 
The inspector arrived at the facility and called licensee.  Licensee stated they were not on property and would not be 
available for the next 3 to 4 hours.  The inspector then left the premises. 
 
 
 
End Section
